creator: m.krijtenburg@ti.mon3aan.nl
text:
The tomcatserver shut's down after a unknown period of little activity( this 
can be within an hour or after 2 days). In the log's I can't find anything 
wrong.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
Can you follow up to the tomcat-user list for more assistance? There are no
known issues with respect to this.
